summary: This is our 8th annual assessment of the Department of Homeland Security's major acquisition programs. These programs acquire systems for operations like securing the border, screening travelers, and improving disaster response. We found that 18 of the 25 programs we reviewed were meeting their cost and schedule goals by the end of FY 2022. DHS also requires programs to identify their cybersecurity risks in a...
title: DHS Annual Assessment: Major Acquisition Programs Are Generally Meeting Goals, but Cybersecurity Policy Needs Clarification
